items.content_html: ColorPicker is the ultimate tool for anyone who works with colors on the web. This lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension lets you select and save colors from any web page, without the need for external libraries or dependencies.

items.content_html: Store is a lightweight shared state library by the StencilJS core team. Implements a simple key/value map that efficiently re-renders components when necessary.

items.content_html: Vans Router is a lightweight and flexible router for building single-page applications (SPAs) using JavaScript. It provides a simple and intuitive API for defining routes, handling navigation events, and updating the view based on the current route.
